events.message: I received my package yesterday, but the laptop screen has a big scratch on it and it doesn't look like it was properly handled.
The reported issue has been categorized under Product Defect due to the description of a scratch and possible damage.
Your case has been assigned to one of our product support agents who will assist you shortly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your laptop screen. I’m here to help you get this resolved as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and the packaging it arrived in to help us assess the damage more accurately?
I have attached clear pictures showing the scratch on the screen and the damaged box it came in. I’m really disappointed because I expected better care.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement device or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we’ll proceed immediately.
I would prefer a replacement laptop since the product itself was exactly what I wanted, but I want to be sure it will be handled carefully this time.
We have arranged for a carefully packed replacement to be shipped out to you within 48 hours, along with a return label for the damaged unit.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement laptop and that it arrived in perfect condition. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory.
Yes, the replacement arrived today and it is in perfect condition. Thank you for the quick resolution and for taking care of this issue.
Since your replacement was received and you are satisfied, we will now officially close this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
